a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Use of interpolation and extrapolation on Maddison GDP per capita data,
In order to produce global estimates of historical poverty trends we have interpolated or extrapolated GDP per capita data for
missing observations. Green indicates GDP observations available in the original source.
Baseline Gini series (GCIP income and van Zanden et al. (2014))
Source: OWID based on Maddison Project Database 2020, GCIP, van Zanden et al. (2014), de la Escosura (2012)
